body:
Lots of people are doing this so why not. Ask me anything, I'll try and answer the best I can.

And yeah, I am staying here when we move on to Zildith - because I believe Zildith will be able to continue the legacy of Avicus and I want to be a part of it.

title: End of Avicus AMA

replies.body: nice person and have had a good laugh in the past, hope you come to zildith so we can stay in touch if we need to :p
replies.body_tagged: nice person and have had a good laugh in the past, hope you come to zildith so we can stay in touch if we need to :p

replies.body:
Opinions?

Best memory of avicus?

Things/people you'll miss when avicus goes down?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?

Best memory of avicus?

Things/people you'll miss when avicus goes down?

replies.body:
Don't really know you

Any of the memories in 2014 and 15 when I actually played and had good friends on there. I still have good friends on here of course but those were great times.

Not going to mention people I will miss but I will miss the atmosphere of Avicus and the kinda of small heritage the server has. It's gonna be a sad day.
